title: Blended Learning-Based Mobile Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customized blended learning design for office workers (administrative/managerial), reflecting organizational culture and learning preferences

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core principles of blended learning using 5-minute mobile content
Learners can apply a blended learning design framework suitable for organizational culture to case analyses
Learners effectively integrate mobile-face-to-face learning strategies with over 80% proficiency through formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
